title: Freight Transport Processes’ Standardization in co-modal transport: Merging LIM and the e-Freight initiatives
segmentation: Carman said that standardization takes 50 years.
Being almost at retirement age, I think I would hope to tell you to tell something of a story which does not take as long as needed sort of come to fruition.
As long as I'm working still.
Before.
Before doing this, I will tell you a little bit about what we call the freight concept.

Customized freight transport management implementations.
Anywhere.

Ifrit solutions are building blocks that may reside in the App Store of the platform where you can actually then have a functional module module that that works for you doing specific functions and then some basic services for communication etc etc, which are then the freight services below there.
So when you are interacting with the freight project you will hear these words, the framework, the platform, the solutions and services.
One aspect, and I said only one aspect of the framework, is about information exchange between parties, and that is the aspect that I will be concentrating on in this little presentation here.

And I would also like to make a comment relating to a topic that was introduced and sometime back as the common framework in the European Union that has been used as a price for a common framework of information and communication systems in transport and logistics.

In the US he's plug is not usable here.
